name: Create new Airtable records from Google Forms valid email responses and sending a Slack message
description: Every time a Google Forms response is submitted, Make will automatically validate the email address of that response. If the email status is "valid" it will create a new record in Airtable and send a Slack message. If the email status is not "valid" it will send a Slack message. For the proper work of this scenario you can use our [example table](https://airtable.com/shr9ovUBUYY0oAWQM).
